issue.title: [C++][Parquet] Consider revamping RleDecoder based on "upstream" changes in Apache Impala
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9498](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9498). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Since the initial code import in 2016, Impala made some improvements to RleDecoder that we might examine to see if they are beneficial for us

See https://github.com/apache/impala/blob/master/be/src/util/rle-encoding.h and history thereof
